|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;C3858;INTEL(R) PROCESSOR, C3858, SR38A 2.0GHZ, J730A409, 77UM807001534; |cpu1_cores = 12 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/04/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao PCE4302AN |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FU7272GL, 1727, CHINA; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== A 1TB [https://www.seagate.com/www-content/datasheets/pdfs/mobile-hddDS1861-2-1603-en_AS.pdf Seagate ST1000LM035] HDD is pictured in the FCC internal photos.
More info could probably be gleaned from the FCC photos by an interested party.
*CPU: [[Intel Atom]] [https://en.wikichip.org/wiki/intel/atom/c3858 C3858] (@2.0GHz, 12-cores, 25W) :[https://en.wikichip.org/wiki/intel/microarchitectures/goldmont Goldmont], [https://en.wikichip.org/wiki/intel/cores/denverton Denverton], 64-bit, 4x 10GbE, 14nm,
[[Category:English Documentation]]
